attributes.action: Replace all flammable cladding on buildings in the UK
attributes.additional_details: The Grenfell Tower fire occurred as a result of flammable cladding and inadequate safety measures. Three years on the problem still remains with thousands across the country living in unsafe buildings. Banning cladding is not enough.
attributes.background: We call on the Government to ensure the replacement of all flammable cladding currently in use.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/327176
